description:
Hana runs away, and encounters the queen of the Planetary Gears, Setsuna, by chance.  The two of them feel a strange sympathy.  But Amarock and Moko appear, and Setsuna, who regains her memories by a telepathic kiss, orders them to capture her.  A fierce battle breaks out between the planetary gears and Daichi, who runs onto the scene.
Source: crunchyroll
